message.original: <KC ATTACK1>後、少し遅らせて<KC ATTACK1>を連続して押す
message.translation: After pressing <KC ATTACK1>, delay a moment and press <KC ATTACK1> repeatedly.
After holding <KC ATTACK2> for a little while, release it.
After holding <KC ATTACK2> for a little while, release it.
Press <KC ATTACK1> while in the air.
Press <KC ATTACK2> while in the air.

message.original: 敵の攻撃を引きつけて<KC WEAPON_SUB>を押す
message.translation: Press <KC WEAPON_SUB> just as an enemy attacks.

message.original: 吹き飛ばされ中に<KC JUMP>を押す
message.translation: While being knocked away, press <KC JUMP>

message.original: しがみつき中に<KC ATTACK1>を押す
message.translation: While climbing an enemy, press <KC ATTACK1>
